name: They Merrily Prance
description:
They Merrily Prance is a short folk horror adventure created in twine. Play as Maryasha Karliner, a jaded button pusher at a bigwig tech company who decides to go for a countryside drive to get the edge off. What happens next can only be described as a sickly Victorian child's fever dream.
This is my first attempt at making a twine, so please let me know things to improve for the future. I had a lot of fun making this, and I hope you will have as much fun playing it!
